players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob on night 1 instead of Charlie who is now dead? That seems suspicious."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Charlie? You'd have known Charlie was town, not Bob. You're lying to mislead us."
Bob: "Diana makes an excellent point - Alice's claim doesn't add up. Why would a real detective investigate me instead of verifying Charlie? Alice must be lying to frame an innocent villager!"
You: "I investigated Bob because I suspected him from the start. Charlie's death confirms my investigation - Bob killed him!"
